Name: Dixie Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: 30 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: Brake up section of cinnamon and drop into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Slightly sweet and somewhat reminiscent of jellybean sweets.
History: Created circa 2005 by Matthew Dakers, a globetrotting professional bartender. For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Garnish: Cinnamon & sugar rim with orange zest twist (flamed)
